basic.title: Basic Settings
basic.notebookSelectorDescription: Select the notebook to store the literature library
basic.referencePathInputDescription: The path to store the literature notes in the library, starting with '/' and separating subdirectories, e.g., '/Assets/References'
basic.databaseSelectorDescription: Select the type of database to use
basic.UseItemKeySwitchDescription:
Use the unique key of the literature in Zotero as an index. When enabled, it can be used independently of the Better BibTeX plugin.
Can only be enabled when using the debug-bridge plugin.
basic.reloadBtnDescription: Reload the database, including checking if the library path exists
basic.deleteDataBtnDescription: Delete all settings data of this plugin (only includes data displayed on the settings panel)
basic.confirmRemove: Confirm to delete the settings data of ${name}?

siyuan.title: SiYuan Content Template
siyuan.titleTemplateInputDescription: Set the title template for generating literature note documents (User modifications will not be refreshed, can be regenerated with 'Refresh All Literature Note Titles').
siyuan.noteTempTexareaDescription: Set the content template for storing literature documents in the library.
siyuan.CustomCiteTextSwitchDescription:
Completely customize the format of citations. The content generated by the citation link template will no longer be anchor text but will be directly inserted into the document.
⚠️Note: After enabling this switch, please ensure that your template includes "...(( {{citeFileID}} "..."))..."; otherwise, the generated links will not reference correctly.
The regular expression for finding citation links is /\(\((.*?)\"(.*?)\"\)\)/g. Please keep this in mind when formatting your template.
siyuan.linkTempInputDescription: Set the template for adding citation links to the document.

zotero.title: Zotero Content Template
zotero.notAbleDescription: The database type being used does not support inserting content into Zotero.
zotero.zoteroLinkTitleTemplateDescription: Set the template for inserting SiYuan backlinks into Zotero's corresponding item when inserting literature. Leave it blank to avoid adding backlinks, set it to "{{siyuan-link}}" to insert without adding a title.
zotero.zoteroTagTemplateDescription: Set the template for adding tags to the corresponding Zotero item when inserting literature. Leave it blank to avoid adding tags; insert multiple tags separated by commas.

debug_bridge.title: Debug-Bridge Plugin
debug_bridge.dbPasswordInputDescription: The password set for the debug-bridge plugin according to the tutorial. The default password in the tutorial is "CTT", which is also the default for this plugin.
